Package com.fssa.projectprovision.dao

Class MilestoneDAO

java.lang.Object
com.fssa.projectprovision.dao.MilestoneDAO
public class MilestoneDAO extends Object
A data access object for managing Milestone data in the database. Provides methods to interact with and manipulate Milestone records.

    • getProjectTasksWithMilestones

      public static List<Milestone> getProjectTasksWithMilestones()
      Retrieves a list of Project Tasks with associated Milestones from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of Milestone objects representing Project Tasks with Milestones.

    • insertMilestone

      public boolean insertMilestone(Milestone milestone)
      Inserts a new Milestone record into the database.
      Parameters:
      milestone - The Milestone object to be inserted.
      Returns:
      True if the insertion was successful, false otherwise.

    • updateMilestone

      public boolean updateMilestone(Milestone milestone)

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      True if the update was successful, false otherwise.

    • deleteMilestoneByTodoId

      public boolean deleteMilestoneByTodoId(int todoId)
      Deletes Milestone records associated with a given ToDo ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      tasks_id - The ToDo ID for which Milestone records should be deleted.
      Returns:
      True if the deletion was successful, false otherwise.
